<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/pokemon"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns a paginated list of Pokémon

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"limit","in":"query","description":"Number of results to return","schema":{"type":"integer","default":20,"minimum":1,"maximum":100000}},{"name":"offset","in":"query","description":"Number of results to skip","schema":{"type":"integer","default":0,"minimum":0}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"count":{"type":"integer","description":"The total number of resources available"},"next":{"type":"string","format":"uri","nullable":true,"description":"The URL for the next page in the list"},"previous":{"type":"string","format":"uri","nullable":true,"description":"The URL for the previous page in the list"},"results":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string","description":"The name of the referenced resource"},"url":{"type":"string","format":"uri","description":"The URL of the referenced resource"}},"title":"NamedAPIResource"}}},"title":"NamedAPIResourceList"},"example":{"count":1292,"next":"https://pokeapi.co/api/v2/pokemon?offset=20&limit=20","previous":null,"results":[{"name":"bulbasaur","url":"https://pokeapi.co/api/v2/pokemon/1/"},{"name":"ivysaur","url":"https://pokeapi.co/api/v2/pokemon/2/"}]}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
